resources.string: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Quisque lacus nunc, rhoncus vel lorem sed, finibus lacinia felis. Ut augue ante, ultrices maximus semper at, elementum ac lectus. Pellentesque semper.
Items are a big part of the game.
Resonators are deployed on a portal in order to capture it or upgrade existing resonators.

There's a limit of resonators of one level a player can deploy on one portal:
1x L8
1x L7
2x L6
2x L5
4x L4
4x L3
4x L2
8x L1.
Power Cubes are used to refill your XM bar.
XM gain is calculted by mutliplying the level by 1000.

Portalkeys are the most important gain of a Hack. With portal keys you are able to link portal A to portal B if you\'re in the range of portal A and if you have a key of portal B. Also are keys useful to recharge portals when not in their range.
Once you\'ve hacked a key out of a portal, you won\'t be able to hack another one unless you drop the key or store it in a capsule.

Shields are a portal\'s bodyguard. They decrease an XMP\'s attack damage. 2 attributes define a shield\'s behavior: Mitigation and Stickiness. Mitigation is the shield\'s protecting abilty. The stickiness effect describes the shield\'s lasting ability, whether it lasts long or not long to XMP attacks.
There are currently rumours out there which are saying that the hack output is slightly increased when hacking a portal of an AXA Building. It\'s in the internet, it must be true..

A multihack is used to increase the max. amount of hacks that can be done in 4 hours (after the first hack). A standard portal can be hacked up to 4 times. Take a look at our simulator to experiment with multihack-effects.
Portal burned out but you don\'t want to wait 4 hours to hack again? See if there is an empty mod slot and put in a multihack to get rid of the cooldown.
lorem ipsum an den leschten mecht d dier zou

Turrets are mods and are used to increase the frequency of a portal\'s attack. F.e. a portal does not always shoot back when you hack or attack it, but with the turrets, you can change this probability.
Very rare link amps can only be received by redeeming a password. They are mostly distributed after having participated at an anomaly.
Softbank Ultra Link Amps have many features. They can increase the link range of a portal, they can act as a shield and they can also max the limit of 8 outbound links to 16 (per SBULA).

MUFG capsules are awesome. They have made getting very rare items much easier, due to the awesome fact that they duplicate items after a certain time that you\'ve them in. Also, every item you put in a MUFG, will no longer take away space of your inventory limit of 2000 items.
To be used on a fast pace hacking portal or in a group of few people.
XMP\'s are weapons used to attack enemy portals. XMP\'s from different levels have different ranges of attack (see Ingress App).
They are easy to hack but easy to waste.

Different to XMPs do Ultra Strikes more damage but in a much tinier area. That\'s why they are used to destroy shields (by staying the nearest to the middle of a portal) or to destroy single resonators by staying on them as well.
Don\'t waste them, they are not that common in hacks.

Ada Refactor and Jarvis Virus are weapons used to instantly change a portal\'s alignment. Once applied on a portal, mods and resonators stay the same, but the name and the faction of the portal changes and links are being destroyed.
Don\'t waste them. You don\'t get AP for destroying resonators, links or fields when using an ADA or Jarvis.
AXA shields are the best shields in Ingress. They have the highest shielding and stickiness effect. As you might guess, they have been introduced in cooperation with AXA (assurance company).

Heatsinks are mods to decrease the waiting time between 2 hacks on the same portal. The standard amount of waiting time is 5 minutes but with heat sinks you can decrease this time to even lower than 1 minute! (See our Portal Simulator)
Forceamps are mods to give a portal the power to answer with more damage by attacking a player. (See Portal Sim.)
Linkamps are mods to increase the maximum link range of a portal.
You can store any item in capsules (except capsules..) but they wont free you space in your inventory.
Fracker are Powerups which can be bought in the Store in Ingress. When used on a Portal, they double the hack output for 10 minutes or for 150 hacks, whatever comes first.
Keylocker are good alternatives to MUFG capsules. Keylocker can only store keys but they do free space in your inventory. They can be bought in the Ingress Store as well.
Beacons are simple marks on the scanner over a portal. For some they are more a fun item than a utility item. They can be found in the store as well, under 4 different variations.
